name: Block GoGo beta
description:
This is a web preview version for a up coming mobile game.

Running with lightning speed, walls are blocking you. You have 4 arms, at top, right, bottom and left of your body. You have to rotate to the arm that fits the hole in the wall to pass, or explode!

Also, try to collect as many gems as you can along the way. You can use those gems to purchase new skins for your arms.

Simply tap on the screen to rotate. Tap on the right part of the screen will make the body rotate clockwise. Tap on the left part of the screen will make the body rotate counter clockwise.

(On Web, you can use the left and right arrow key to rotate the body)

Credits:
==================================================
Game design:  Chris Yang, Patrick Sommor
Art: Patrick Sommer
